about_the_game:
Long ago, in the snow-covered mountains of a distant neighborhood, a legend emerged about 2 skiers, known as the Legendary Skiers. It was said that they could glide through the steepest and most challenging peaks with unparalleled grace and skill. Their movements in the snow were like a synchronized dance with nature, and many believed they possessed magical powers to control the wind and snow.

The legend of the Legendary Skiers echoed through the villages and towns below the mountains, inspiring adventurers and skiers from all over the city to seek them out, hoping to learn their secrets and become exceptional skiers themselves. Many tried, but returned only with stories of failure and disappointment.


Skizz is a relaxing experience to enjoy in your free time, without rigid objectives. Explore a variety of skis and clothes with unique features and benefits, enhancing your way down the mountain while unraveling the rumors of legends. Level up and permanently improve your speed and stability skills as you progress through the game
